channel.title: Citation for Syndie being stalled?
channel.description:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/I2P#RetroShare states the following:
> The development of I2P's distributed forum software (Syndie) is stalled indefinitely.
Is there a citation available for this? It looks like that statement was added on April 23, 2016: https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=I2P&type=revision&diff=23281&oldid=22651 . There have been about 2.5 pages of GitHub commits to Syndie since that date: https://github.com/i2p/i2p.syndie/commits/master .
Thanks!

item.title: Citation for Syndie being stalled?
item.dc:creator: JeremyRand
item.description:
HulaHoop:

This is great news and definitely a new development since this was written. I’ll change the wiki to reflect that.

Thanks HulaHoop!

Read full topic

item.title: Citation for Syndie being stalled?

item.description:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/I2P#RetroShare states the following:

The development of I2P’s distributed forum software (Syndie) is stalled indefinitely.

Is there a citation available for this? It looks like that statement was added on April 23, 2016: https://www.whonix.org/w/index.php?title=I2P&type=revision&diff=23281&oldid=22651 . There have been about 2.5 pages of GitHub commits to Syndie since that date: https://github.com/i2p/i2p.syndie/commits/master .
